name: Advenio Software
description:
We are a company of IT professionals with vast experience on development of high-tech solutions. We carry on creative and non-conventional projects using the latest technologies. Our interdisciplinary team develops solutions of great complexity and high social impact in areas such as Health Managment Systems, Computer Based Training (CBT), maritime safety, telecommunications and management of critical information in real time.
We are aware that our products and services are essential tools for achieving our customer’s goals. Providing personalized customer services, identifying their needs and striving to exceed their expectations, we create long-term relations based on trust and mutual benefits.
Advenio is a Latin word which means to arrive. In our professional activity, we consider very important to achieve our goals working with firmness, enthusiasm and perseverance.
